def_en: Socks are pieces of clothing which cover your foot and ankle and are worn inside shoes.

def_cn: 给…留下深刻印象;使…深受触动
def_en: If someone socks it to another person, they do or say something that makes a great impression on them.

def_cn: (叫某人)加把劲儿，好好努力，干得好一点
def_en: If you tell someone to pull their socks up, you mean that they should start working or studying harder, because they have been lazy or careless.
